
```{r }
library(tidyverse)
source("https://bioconductor.org/biocLite.R")
biocLite("phyloseq")
library(phyloseq)
metadata = read.table(file="Saanich.metadata.txt", header=TRUE, row.names=1, sep="\t", na.strings=c("NAN","NA","."))
OTUdata = read.table(file="Saanich.OTU.txt", header=TRUE, row.names=1, sep="\t", na.strings=c("NAN","NA","."))
load("phyloseq_object.RData")
ggplot(metadata, aes(x=O2_uM, y=Depth_m))

ggplot(metadata, aes(x=O2_uM, y=Depth_m)) +
  geom_point()
ggplot(metadata) +
  geom_point(aes(x=O2_uM, y=Depth_m))

ggplot(metadata, aes(x=O2_uM, y=Depth_m, color="blue")) +
  geom_point()
ggplot(metadata, aes(x=O2_uM, y=Depth_m)) +
  geom_point(color="blue")
ggplot(metadata, aes(x=O2_uM, y=Depth_m)) +
  geom_point(shape="square")

ggplot(metadata, aes(x=O2_uM, y=Depth_m)) +
  geom_point(size=10)

ggplot(metadata, aes(x=O2_uM, y=Depth_m, size=OxygenSBE_V)) +
  geom_point()

#Excercise 1
ggplot(metadata, aes(x=SiO2_uM, y=Depth_m)) +
  geom_point(shape=24, color="purple", size=10)

physeq
plot_bar(physeq, fill="Phylum")
physeq_percent = transform_sample_counts(physeq, function(x) 100 * x/sum(x))
plot_bar(physeq_percent, fill="Phylum")
plot_bar(physeq_percent, fill="Phylum") + 
  geom_bar(aes(fill=Phylum), stat="identity")  

#Excercise 3
physeq
plot_bar(physeq, fill="Class")
physeq_percent = transform_sample_counts(physeq, function(x) 100 * x/sum(x))
plot_bar(physeq_percent, fill="Class")
plot_bar(physeq_percent, fill="Class") +
  geom_bar(aes(fill=Class), stat="identity") +
  labs( x = "Sample Depth", y = "Percent relative abundance")

plot_bar(physeq_percent, fill="Phylum") +
  geom_bar(aes(fill=Phylum), stat="identity") +
  facet_wrap(~Phylum)

plot_bar(physeq_percent, fill="Phylum") +
  geom_bar(aes(fill=Phylum), stat="identity") +
  facet_wrap(~Phylum, scales="free_y") +
  theme(legend.position="none")

#Excercise 4
metadata %>%
  select(NH4_uM, NO2_uM, NO3_uM, O2_uM, PO4_uM, SiO2_uM, Depth_m) %>%
  gather("nutrients", "uM", c(1:6))%>%
  ggplot() + #tells it to use ggplot
  geom_point(aes(x=Depth_m, y=uM )) + #use a point graph
  facet_grid(~nutrients, scales="free")
```
